partintro.para: The Satellite extension is used for accessing CORBA objects. You will need to set the idl_directory= entry in php.ini to a path where you store all IDL files you use.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This class provides access to a CORBA object. The ior parameter should be a string containing the IOR (Interoperable Object Reference) that identifies the remote object.

example.title: Sample IDL file

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This class represents the enumeration identified with the id parameter. The id can be either the name of the enumeration (e.g "MyEnum"), or the full repository id (e.g. "IDL:MyEnum:1.0").

example.title: PHP code for accessing MyEnum
example.programlisting:
<?php $enum = new OrbitEnum ("MyEnum");
echo $enum->a; /* write 0 */ echo $enum->c; /* write 2 */ echo $enum->e; /* write 4 */ ?>

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This class represents the structure identified with the id parameter. The id can be either the name of the struct (e.g "MyStruct"), or the full repository id (e.g. "IDL:MyStruct:1.0").

example.title: Sample IDL file
PHP code for accessing MyStruct
example.programlisting:
<?php
$obj = new OrbitObject ($ior);

$initial_values = new OrbitStruct ("IDL:MyStruct:1.0");
$initial_values->shortvalue = 42;
$initial_values->stringvalue = "HGTTG";

$obj->SetValues ($initial_values);

$values = $obj->GetValues();

echo $values->shortvalue;
echo $values->stringvalue;
?>

refnamediv.refpurpose: See if an exception was caught from the previous function

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function returns true if an exception has been caught.

example.title: Sample IDL file
PHP code for handling CORBA exceptions
example.programlisting:
<?php
$obj = new OrbitObject ($ior);

$obj->AskWhy();

if (satellite_caught_exception()) {
    if ("IDL:OutOfCheeseError:1.0" == satellite_exception_id()) {
        $exception = satellite_exception_value();
        echo $exception->parameter;
    }
}
?>

refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the repository id for the latest excetpion.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Return a repository id string. (E.g. "IDL:MyException:1.0".) For example usage see satellite_caught_exception.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the exception struct for the latest exception

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Return an exception struct. For example usage see satellite_caught_exception.
